Player History

Drafted in 3rd round, 58th overall pick, by Boston in 1973...
Earned first career win on 5/17/1977...
Injured on 8/3/1982 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 4/18/1985 to a minor league deal...
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1987...
Injured on 8/3/1988 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/7/1989 with a Stiff Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/9/1991 with a Broken Foot, out for 8 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1992, off Frank Viola (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/1992, off Dave Stieb (LA)...
Injured on 8/7/1993 with a Stress Fractured Ulna, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1994, hitting .565 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 7/16/1995...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1996...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1997, hitting .356 with 6 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/1/1997 with a Broken Foot, out for 5-6 weeks...
